name: Aloe Vera
basic_care: Aloe Vera thrives in bright, indirect light and needs well-draining soil. It is a low-maintenance plant and can tolerate dry conditions.
watering_instructions: Water sparingly, allowing the soil to dry out between waterings. Water only once every 3 weeks during winter.

name: Spider Plant
basic_care: Spider plants prefer moderate to bright light and are easy to care for. They can tolerate occasional neglect.
watering_instructions: Water thoroughly but allow the soil to dry out between waterings. Water once every week during the warmer months.

name: Snake Plant
basic_care: Snake plants can thrive in low light and are quite resilient. They require little maintenance and can tolerate neglect.
watering_instructions: Water once every 2-3 weeks, allowing the soil to dry out completely between waterings.

name: Peace Lily
basic_care: Peace Lilies thrive in low to medium light and have attractive white blooms. They are easy to maintain and are great indoor plants.
watering_instructions: Water consistently to keep the soil moist but not soggy. Water once a week or when the soil feels dry.

name: Pothos
basic_care: Pothos is a low-maintenance plant that can grow in a variety of conditions, including low light. It’s perfect for beginners.
watering_instructions: Water once a week or when the top of the soil feels dry.

name: ZZ Plant
basic_care: ZZ Plants thrive in low light and are known for their ability to survive with minimal care.
watering_instructions: Water every 2-3 weeks, allowing the soil to dry out completely between waterings.

name: Monstera
basic_care: Monstera plants prefer bright, indirect light and are well-known for their dramatic, split leaves.
watering_instructions: Water when the top of the soil feels dry, about once a week. Water more often in the growing season.

name: Ficus
basic_care: Ficus are known for their large, glossy leaves and prefer bright, indirect light. They are relatively easy to care for.
watering_instructions: Water when the top inch of soil feels dry. Water thoroughly but allow excess water to drain.

name: Cactus
basic_care: Cacti are hardy plants that prefer bright, direct sunlight and minimal watering.
watering_instructions: Water once every 2-3 weeks, allowing the soil to dry out completely before watering again.

name: Bamboo Palm
basic_care: Bamboo palms are easy to grow and thrive in bright, indirect light with regular misting.
watering_instructions: Water every week, keeping the soil moist but not soggy.

name: English Ivy
basic_care: English Ivy is a fast-growing plant that prefers bright, indirect light and moderate humidity.
watering_instructions: Water once a week or when the soil feels dry to the touch.

name: Bird of Paradise
basic_care: Bird of Paradise plants thrive in bright light and need a lot of space to grow.
watering_instructions: Water thoroughly when the soil feels dry. Water every 7-10 days, more frequently during the warmer months.

name: Chinese Evergreen
basic_care: Chinese Evergreens are low-maintenance plants that thrive in low to medium light.
watering_instructions: Water every 1-2 weeks, allowing the top of the soil to dry out between waterings.

name: Calathea
basic_care: Calathea plants thrive in low to medium light and are known for their decorative, patterned leaves.
watering_instructions: Keep the soil evenly moist. Water once a week or when the soil feels dry.

name: Succulent
basic_care: Succulents require bright light and dry conditions. They are perfect for low-maintenance plant owners.
watering_instructions: Water only when the soil is dry, usually once every 2-3 weeks.

name: Rubber Plant
basic_care: Rubber plants are hardy and thrive in bright, indirect light.
watering_instructions: Water when the top of the soil is dry, about once every week or two.

name: Basil
basic_care: Basil plants require full sunlight and warm temperatures to thrive. They are commonly grown for culinary purposes.
watering_instructions: Water regularly, about once every 2-3 days, to keep the soil moist but not waterlogged.

name: Lavender
basic_care: Lavender prefers full sunlight and well-drained soil. It’s drought-tolerant once established.
watering_instructions: Water when the soil is dry. Water less frequently in winter, about once every 2-3 weeks.

name: Crown of Thorns
basic_care: Crown of Thorns thrives in full sunlight and is very drought-tolerant. It is known for its vibrant, colorful flowers.
watering_instructions: Water every 2-3 weeks or when the soil feels dry to the touch.

name: Jade Plant
basic_care: Jade plants are very low-maintenance and require plenty of sunlight and well-draining soil.
watering_instructions: Water once every 2-3 weeks, allowing the soil to dry out completely between waterings.

name: Ferns
basic_care: Ferns prefer indirect light and high humidity. They are perfect for bathrooms or kitchens.
watering_instructions: Water regularly to keep the soil moist. Water once a week or when the soil feels dry.

name: Chives
basic_care: Chives thrive in full sunlight and are often grown in herb gardens.
watering_instructions: Water regularly, keeping the soil moist but not soggy. Water about once every 2-3 days.

name: Bromeliad
basic_care: Bromeliads thrive in bright, indirect light. They are low-maintenance and require little watering.
watering_instructions: Water the plant directly into the central cup and mist the surrounding leaves. Water about once a week.

name: Coleus
basic_care: Coleus plants prefer bright, indirect light and are known for their colorful foliage.
watering_instructions: Water consistently, keeping the soil moist. Water once every week or when the soil feels dry.

name: Begonia
basic_care: Begonias prefer indirect light and should be kept in a humid environment.
watering_instructions: Water when the soil feels dry to the touch. Water about once every week.

name: African Violet
basic_care: African Violets prefer moderate, indirect light and require a bit of extra care to bloom.
watering_instructions: Water from the bottom or keep the soil moist, but avoid wetting the leaves. Water every 7-10 days.

name: Geranium
basic_care: Geraniums require full sunlight and well-draining soil to grow well.
watering_instructions: Water once a week or when the soil feels dry to the touch.

name: Kalanchoe
basic_care: Kalanchoe is a succulent plant that needs bright light and dry conditions.
watering_instructions: Water every 2-3 weeks, allowing the soil to dry out completely between waterings.
